sentences.sContent: Lemelson holds patents on machine-vision systems, an industrial robot, a fax machine, a copy machine, a tape-recorder drive, and a camcorder.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lemelson holds patents on machine-vision systems, an industrial robot, a fax machine, a copy machine, a tape-recorder drive, and a camcorder.
sentences.sCn: 他发明过机器视觉系统、工业机器人、传真机、复印机、磁带记录器驱动器以及便携式摄像机。

trans.tranCn: 摄录像机；便携式摄像机
trans.tranOther: a type of camera that records pictures and sound on  videotape
